is there any previous version of airbus x installed, I mean there are some torrents which offer airbus x rip version, you just uninstall and reinstall, search your fsx directory for other remnants of the bird (you can use Windows Installer Cleanup Utility, but manual method is one which I prefer), eg: there may be other gpsmodule.dll or something in effects folder would have left as such.Tell me if it worked for you! @fsxomz after installing V1.20, copy "gpsmodule.dll" (Modules Folder) and the "Navigraph" Folder(Main fsx Folder)to desktop.Then install other updates.Copy back from desktop"gpsmodulle.dll"on its own first,see if that works.This worked for me earlier,when  the 1.21 version was out.Hope it helps

@fsxomz

if it remained even after uninstalling, delete it manually and then reinstall
